title: About Google in Canada - About Google around the world
text: Economic Impact Report 2024 Learn about our impact across the country. Through partnership and the power of AI, we can drive a new era of innovation, with Canada at the forefront. $230 billion Generative AI has the potential to boost Canadaâs economy by $230 billion and could save the average Canadian worker over 170 hours a year, freeing them up to concentrate on more fulfilling parts of their jobs. $63 billion We estimate that in a given year, Google services like Google Search and Workspace unlock an estimated $63 billion improvement in productivity for the Canadian economy. $70 billion In 2024, Google Search, Google Play, YouTube, Google Cloud and Googleâs advertising tools helped provide over $70 billion of economic activity for Canadian businesses, nonprofits, publishers, creators and developers. $9.2 billion In 2024, Google's products and services fueled over $70 billion in economic activity, including $9.2 billion in exports. Learn about our impact across the country. Discover how AI is shaping Canada's future.
